sentence: What do you call a girl with an hourglass figure? a waist of time.
explanation: The waist is the part of the body between the ribs and hips.
first_new_sentence: I wore that dress to highlight my slim waist.
second_new_sentence: The waist of the hourglass is the narrow part that connects the two larger sections.

sentence: Note: Only one joke met the criteria for selection, resulting in only one entry for the CSV.
